titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that any resolution to the Israeli-Palestinian conflict should come from direct bilateral negotiations without preconditions and without interference from the United Nations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Middle East and North Africa.

bill.summary: 4/28/2015--Introduced. It is the sense of the House of Representatives that a resolution to the Israeli-Palestinian conflict should come from direct bilateral negotiations without preconditions and without interference from the United Nations.
